name: Kura5: Bonds of the Undying DEMO
name_original: Kura5: Bonds of the Undying DEMO
description:
The Sun Rises!

Kura5 is a non-canonical fan game for the Boktai series and it's successor, Lunar Knights.

The game stars two characters that you can control: Annie, a Bounty Hunter from the San Miguel Guild, and Emil, a Vampire Swordsman whose power grows in shadows. The two must overcome their differences and fight together if they can hope to face the otherworldly threat that looms over the earth.

In place of the solar sensor, Kura5 game includes a new feature called "WeatherSync". Using your computer's IP Address, the game can use local weather data and sync it to the game's own weather. But beware! The forces of darkness can bend the weather to their command...

WeatherSync

In place of the solar sensor, Kura5 uses a new feature called "WeatherSync". WeatherSync gets your location using your IP Address, then gathers local weather data based on where you play the game. But watch out! Immortals have the power to override the weather within their domain until defeated.

For WeatherSync to work, please make sure that you are not connected to a VPN or proxy. WeatherSync will turn itself off if it cannot connect. To disable WeatherSync, go to the options menu from the titlescreen.

Windows PC Requirements
  • Windows XP Service Pack 2 or higher
  • DirectX 9 or higher GPU
  • 1024x768 screen resolution
  • 2.0 GHz Dual Core Pentium, i3, or higher processor
  • ~500 MB available hard drive space
  • 2 GB RAM

Note that these are rough estimates. If you're not sure if your computer can run the game, try playing it on the "Fastest" setting on startup.
